price: (11) Allāh begins creation; then He will repeat it; then to Him you will be returned.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
